abilities.description:
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} +edge, you may choose one before rolling.

  • Barrage: Retain initiative on a weak hit but inflict only 1 harm.
  • Sever limb: Inflict +1 harm on a hit but suffer -1 momentum.
  • Follow up: On a strong hit, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} now and add +1.
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} to recover thrown chakram, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you use your chakram as a simple weapon (1 harm), you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} +iron (instead of +edge). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
